entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You stopped the escape of some prisoners whose transport shuttle crashed outside of Mos Eisley.
entries.journal_entry_description: Peawp wants you to investigate some battle droids that crashed in an escape pod just outside of Mos Eisley.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Some malfunctioning battle droids accidentally jettisoned themselves from a starship in an escape pod, and that pod landed not far from Mos Eisley. Go disable those battle droids before they cause more trouble.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: Still alive? How curious. But that being the case, you will do something for me. Jabba arranged for a shuttle of prisoners to be shot down. You will go and make sure no one survived.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Still alive? How curious. But that being the case, you will do something for me. Jabba arranged for a shuttle of prisoners to be shot down. You will go and make sure no one survived.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Jabba had a shuttle that was transporting prisoners shot down as it was leaving Mos Eisley. Bib has ordered you to eliminate any survivors. He hasn't said why he wants this done, and he also isn't giving you any choice in the matter.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Return to Peawp R'dawc and let her know you took care of the battle droids. You're not sure that you should say anything about what Bib Fortuna coerced you into doing.
